idm.oidcProviderEditor.issuerUrlHelp: Enter the URL that uniquely identifies the OIDC provider. Consult your OIDC provider's administrator for more information.
idm.oidcProviderEditor.callbackUrlHelp: Enter the URL that the OIDC provider requires for redirection after authentication.
idm.oidcProviderEditor.clientIdHelp: Enter the ID that the OIDC provider will use to identify your device. Consult your OIDC provider's administrator for more information.
idm.oidcProviderEditor.clientSecretHelp: Enter the secret that the OIDC provider will use to authenticate your device. Consult your OIDC provider's administrator for more information.
idm.oidcProviderEditor.confirmClientSecretHelp: Confirm the client secret entered above.
idm.oidcProviderEditor.roleClaimPathHelp: Enter the JSONPath expression that addresses the role claim in the token. Consult your OIDC provider's administrator for more information.
idm.oidcProviderEditor.roleClaimSeparatorHelp: Enter the delimiter character that separates role names if they are provided in a single string. Consult your OIDC provider's administrator for more information.
idm.oidcProviderEditor.errClientSecretMismatch: Client secret confirmation does not match
idm.oidcProviderEditor.errRoleClaimPathPattern: Enter a role claim path in JSONPath notation
